summary: I BEEN FIGHTING THIS P0011 CODE FOR OVER A YEAR.  I'VE REPLACED THE WHOLE ENGINE,  SENSORS,  ECM, AND OTHER THINGS ASSOCIATED WITH THIS PROBLEM. THIS CODE CAN BE ANYTHING. DOESN'T MAKE ANY SENSE FOR 100 THINGS TO BE ASSOCIATED WITH 1 CODE. I'VE OWNED MANY VEHICLES AND I HONESTLY NEVER EXPERIENCED A PROBLEM LIKE THIS.  COSTED ME OVER 10K IN DIAGNOSTICS, PARTS, AND LABOR.  I'M NOT THE ONLY 1 WITH THIS PROBLEM.  VERY UNFAIR.  CADILLAC SHOULD BE RESPONSIBLE FOR THIS PROBLEM. THIS ENGINE DESIGN HAS TOO MANY FLAWS!
